titleStmt.title: The contre-league and ansvvere to certaine letters sent to the Maisters of Renes, by one of the League who termeth himselfe Lord of the valley of Mayne, and gentleman of the late Duke of Guizes traine. Faithfully translated into English by E.A.
Contre ligue. English.
titleStmt.author: Aggas, Edward.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Edward Aggas, of: La contre ligue.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
